name: 曾釋鋒
objective:
本課程沿續「積體電路製程先進技術與設備」課程，介紹半導體世代機台開發與製程應用、關鍵元件設計概念與應用，著重科學基礎知識如何應用在半導體產業。
As an extension of “Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing” course, this course focuses on how the scientific knowledge is connected and applied to the real development of tools and introduces the evolution of the design and application of semiconductor tools and key components.
